Detailed Description

PreSyn::PreSyn ( double *  src,
ConfigBase *  osrc,
ConfigBase *  ssrc = 0 
)

Pre-synapses class.

PreSyn class is an amalgm of classes in NEURON and SpikeSim. This should be on the node where the pre-cell neuron was constructed.
